description: Developed an iOS and Android app streamlining contact numbers. Ensures compliance with Mexico's dialing rules, adding city codes seamlessly. Eliminated 044/045 and extra digits, simplifying dialing. From abroad, simply add +52. Offering an efficient solution for seamless communication.
